16 March 2013

Conference Videos 2012

I wanted a list of video links to some interesting conferences so I will add them here as a reference for others.

Note: This is was sitting around on my harddrive, published incase its of use to someone else.

FP Days Cambridge 2012

  • Introduction to Concurrent Haskell
  • Functional DSLs for Biocomputation
  • Clojure, Functional Programming and Data at uSwitch.com
  • Leiningen 2 - Humane build management for Clojure
  • Zen and the Art of Live Programming
  • What They Don’t Teach You About Running a Business When Taking Your CS Degree
  • An Introduction to Logic Programming on the JVM with core.logic (Clojure)
  • Reverend Bayes, Meet Countess Lovelace: Machine Learning and Programming
  • F# Big Data Scripting
  • Lessons from Functional Programming in Five Languages
  • Clojure after the Honeymoon

Strange Loop 2012

  • Ozma: Extending Scala with Oz Concurrency
  • Erlang Web Development with Yaws
  • Functional Design Patterns
  • Designing Fault Tolerant Distributed Applications
  • River Trail – Parallel Programming in JavaScript
  • Cross-Browser Testing with BrowserStack
  • Voice Navigated Apps. How Can You Start Using It?
  • The Higher Order Rubyist
  • A Relational Database System in which Joins Cost Zero
  • Software Architecture using ZeroMQ
  • F# for Trading

Clojure West 2012

  • Rich Hickey on Datomic, CAP and ACID
  • Distributed Apps: The Joys of Testing and Debugging
  • Macros are Hard!
  • Beyond Ninjas: DOM Manipulation with ClojureScript and Domina
  • Building ClojureScript Libraries: Google Closure and Challenges of a Young Language
  • ClojureScript Anatomy
  • Bootstrapping Clojure at Groupon
  • DSLs in Clojure
  • Engineering(,) A Path to Science: “I don’‘t want to die in a language I can’‘t understand”
  • Namespaces, Vars, and Symbols (Oh, My!)
  • Continuous Testing in Clojure
  • The Generative Generation
  • Thinking in Data
  • Laziness: the Good, the Bad, and the Ugly
  • Swarm Coding
  • The Good, The Bad & The Ugly (Clojure & JRuby)
  • Practical core.logic
  • SOLID Clojure
  • Distilling Java Libraries
  • Crunching Numbers with Clojure - 11 Tips to Boost Your Performance
  • Real World Clojure - Doing Boring Stuff With An Exciting Language
  • Storm: Distributed and Fault-tolerant Real-time Computation
  • Accessing Real-World APIs from Clojure
  • Clojure in the Clouds
  • Building User Interfaces with Seesaw
  • Knockbox, an Eventual Consistency Toolkit
  • Introducing Immutant
  • Building Tools to Help Kids Win with ADHD
  • The Taming of the Deftype
  • clojure @ runa :: dynamic pricing through DSLs
  • Clojure-powered Startups
  • What Sucks about Clojure…and Why You’‘ll Love It Anyway
  • Statistical Graphics, ClojureScript, &c.
  • Programming with Values in Clojure
  • The Design of Datomic
  • Evident Code, at Scale
  • Why Prismatic Goes Faster With Clojure

  • Erik Meijer on Big Data, Types of Data Stores and Reactive Programming
  • The Startup Hangover: Supporting 15M Users
  • Concurrent Programming Using The Disruptor
  • Building Scalable Products that Customers Love
  • Writing Datomic in Clojure
  • The Impedance Mismatch is Our Fault

  • Erik Meijer discusses programming language design, effects and some web programming problems
  • Stefan Tilkov on REST and Hypermedia, ROCA, WebSockets vs. HTTP
  • Laurent Sansonetti on Writing Ruby Apps for iOS with RubyMotion
